positive: I'm also taking up video editing as a hobby and am planning on doing a post-grad in machine learning as well, so ideally I'd want a powerful GPU (which seems to be taken care of by the RTX 2080) and a powerful CPU as well (Intel i9?).

I wanted to spread some of the knowledge I've accrued over the last year and try to help people that may be hunting for a new laptop this Black Friday Holiday or looking for one as a gift for a loved one friend family member.
So yes, very good slim light laptop overall, 15.3" screen size is perfect too, though I hope these spinning wheel, fan noise, trackpad issues are all software related and get a quick fix from Lenovo.
negative: I have the jist of what to look for but I start going brain dead when comparing SDRAM vs DRAM, graphics and 802.11ax vs Infrared.
All IPS panels have IPS glow, but this one has the worst case of glow I've ever seen.
The low RPM noise isnâ€™t too bad, itâ€™s just the fact itâ€™s there at all that irks me.
